Paul Nechifor

Hi. I’m a software developer currently living in London.

Projects

You can see a listing of all my projects here on my site or on GitHub.

Probably the most successful project of mine is Ohmu, a tool for visualising space usage in your terminal.

I’m working on my own programming language called LemonCake.

I like creating my own games, but I’ve failed at finishing anything of significance. Some examples are: TorusCycle, chess puzzles, 1930, and Makawa.

I’ve created Reddit bots for correcting spelling, generating word clouds, summarizing long comments, and detecting pairs.

I publish my dotfiles.

Hobbies

I’m interested in constructed scripts. I’ve created Sidrem and Tinutok.

See what I consider the best black metal albums.

See my Instagram account for my origami creations.

Contact

My email address is paul@nechifor.net.
